# XCore Integration Configuration

## Overview

The XCore Integration Configuration module provides a centralized mechanism for defining and managing settings specific to individual integrations within the XCore system. This configuration governs aspects such as caching behavior, scheduling policies, database connections, logging levels, and extension deployments.  This file is the primary source of truth for configuring how each integration interacts with its environment and other components of XCore.

## Responsibilities

The `
